details: All exception handlers now log errors with exc_info=True for full stack trace visibility
Ensures better debugging and error traceability across all API resources

description: Implemented robust Supabase error handling across CryoProtect API
details: Replaced all direct Supabase response error checks with a unified handle_supabase_error function in api/utils.py.
handle_supabase_error is compatible with both old and new Supabase client versions, handling error attributes, data dicts, and Pydantic models.
All Supabase client calls are now wrapped in try/except blocks and use handle_supabase_error for error detection and status code mapping.
Enhanced error detection for AuthApiErrorResponse, StorageAPIError, RLS/authorization, and duplicate/exists errors.
Model and resource layers updated for consistent error handling and improved maintainability.
